links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (12,-54,108,-81).
mathematica: lst={}; Do[i=3^n*n^3; AppendTo[lst,i], {n,5!}]; lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Sep 22 2009 *)Table[n^3 3^n,{n,0,20}] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{12,-54,108,-81},{0,3,72,729},30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 17 2014 *)
prog: (PARI) for(n=0,22,print((n^3)*(3^n)))(PARI) { for (n=0, 200, write("b062074.txt", n, " ", n^3 * 3^n) ) } [_Harry J. Smith_, Jul 31 2009]
